```{r}
devtools::install_github("GIScience/openrouteservice-r")
library("openrouteservice")
library(leaflet)
```

one-time API key set-up: ors_api_key("<your-api-key>")

```{r}
locations <- lapply(c("n4 2zt", " N8 9LP"), ors_geocode)
coordinates <- lapply(locations, function(x)
  x$features[[1]]$geometry$coordinates)
coordinates
```

```{r}
route <- ors_directions(coordinates, profile = "foot-walking", format = "geojson")
unlist(route$features[[1]]$properties$summary) / c(1000, 60)
```

```{r}
leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addGeoJSON(route, fill = FALSE) %>%
  fitBBox(route$bbox)
```
